title: How is RSD Hostel in Greater Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dear friend when you'll be leaving home for studies you will face many problems .Its hard to live in some other atmosphere then of our home.In what so ever hostel you may go you'll be finding one or another difficulties but its ok this is life and you have to let them go.May be you won't find good food or you may have problem regarding any maintenance but with patience you can over come difficulties so you can stay in this hostel or any other which may suits your requirement much.And hopefully you may get people around you!Good luck ahead.

Well their much better option to live in Greater Noida, for example, Student Inn, they provide top quality hostels. Their services are one of the best at a very affordable price. their rooms are pretty spacious with TV, Internet connection, laundry services, Housekeeping service, 24*7 security, Coffee vending machine, and gaming area, etc.
